channel.title: Where everybody knows my name
channel.description: Recent content on Where everybody knows my name

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Norman Bauer. I am the owner of Wye Oak Mobile Device Repair and Wye Oak Business Solutions. I have many interests such as, my wife & our kids (2 girls), outdoors stuff, canning, long term food storage, cryptocurrency, presciouse metals, Austrian Economomics, libertarinism, agorism, the US Constitution, electronics, programming, computer repair, virtualization, Linux, Linux Containers, networking, books, UFO’s, music, radio’s (CB, AM, Shortwave, and some HAM stuff too), and a lot more.

item.title: The 1st
item.description: Here is the first post. I am leaving this as a sample and do not intend to get rid of it. This site is a work in progress. It is meant for my pleasure and to server whatever ends I think are needed. You’ll probably find topics that range from libertarianism to technology and all things inbetween.
